root.title: Mainz 171 (TM 340)
root.store: It is stored in the Berlin-Brandenburg Academy of Sciences (Berlin-Brandenburgischen Akademie der Wissenschaften).
root.general: The left part of the manuscript with one written side. There is an ink stain on the left edge (2.4 cm).
root.description: Manuscript: Old Turkic, on the right the same text in Uig. Paper: light brown, firm. Quantity of lines: 4 lines. Designations: on the right top corner stickers Mainz 171 and TM 340. Characteristics: text columns are separated by horizontal line.
root.size: Distance between lines: 1.8 cm. 3.3 cm (height) x 9.9 cm (width).
root.investigation: A.Le Coq 425 and L.Clark 422 conducted researches. Clark designated as an “Abecedary”.
root.details: Depositum der BERLIN-BRANDENBURGISCHEN AKADEMIE DER WISSENSCHAFTEN in der STAATSBIBLIOTHEK ZU BERLIN - Preussischer Kulturbesitz. Orientabteilung. Mainz 171 (TM 340).
